Content.Text:
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You know the
saying, "Rise and shine." Let's get
focused and start the day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you get up
feeling refreshed? That's the best way 
to start the day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're
yawning? And there's dried up drool on
the side of your mouth.
<PAGE>
If you're feeling tired, you must take
care not to overexert yourself.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. You look well today, as usual. Is
work going well?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. Are you taking good care of your
farm tools?
<PAGE>
I believe that in order to do good work,
one must first take care of one's tools.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. I would appreciate any advice you
can give me regarding ores.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is something the matter, <MYNAME>? Working
in the dark can lead to injury.
<PAGE>
I believe that one should call it a day
at a reasonable hour.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This has been another safe day of work.
Let us rest well for another day
tomorrow.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. The quiet night
air feels good, doesn't it? It's very
soothing.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Being involved
with me will reap no benefits for you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I was hoping that
I would have a chance to greet you this
morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I really didn't expect to see you. I am
grateful I was mistaken.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Oh, your hair is
tousled from sleep. No, not there. Up
higher.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Yes, that's better. Let's give it our
all again today.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is it, <MYNAME>? I'm sorry, but would
you mind not talking?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I'm not  feeling very well. It's
because...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Look at the hour.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Lately, every day has been so pleasant.
And time goes by so quickly. I'm sure
it's because of you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Is there something
troubling you at work?
<PAGE>
I'm your girlfriend. If there's anything
I can do, please tell me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>? I wonder what it is. I feel so
listless lately. I need to get to the
root of the cause.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you done with work, <MYNAME>? If so,
would you mind if we talked?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'd like for us to spend some time
together once in a while, just the two
of us.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Was it a hard day
at work again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If you're feeling tired, I can play some
music for you.
<PAGE>
If it'll make you feel even a little
better, I'll do my best.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Good morning, <MYNAME>. If there's nothing
important, can you not talk to me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Isn't it such
a refreshing morning?
<PAGE>
I will be a diligent wife, so please do
your best at work.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You seem to have had a
restful night. You were sleeping very 
peacefully.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heehee... Don't be embarrassed. I'm
truly glad that I married you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the matter, <MYNAME>? Are you done
with work?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem tired, <MYNAME>. Will you be
busy again today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>You are such a hard worker, but please
don't overdo it. For my sake too...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Yes. We live together, yet you don't
greet me until noon. Were you really so
busy this morning?
<PAGE>
It makes me sad when I don't hear your
voice at the start of my day...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
We're married, yet we don't speak to
each other until now...
<PAGE>
Don't you care anything at all about me?
While it's sad, I guess I have no
choice but to endure it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you still working?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I don't mean to pressure you, but please
come home as early as possible today.
So that I can say good night to you...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's already nighttime, are you still
working? Yes, I realize that farming is
very hard work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>When
the man of the house is gone, it's very
lonely... So do come home early.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The weather today is nice and very
soothing.
<PAGE>
It makes me want to go outside and play
my instrument. I'm sure I'll get a very
soothing sound.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining and I'm sure the crops in
the garden are very happy.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Isn't it so hot today? If only there was
a breeze to make the heat more bearable.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to the rain, it's gotten cooler
today.
<PAGE>
I like the sound of summer rain. It's as
though the sky is playing music on the
earth and little people are dancing.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there. The moon is so beautiful on
clear autumn nights, isn't it? Are you
out moon-viewing?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a long day. Autumn rain makes me
feel a little lonely. What about you,
dear?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's cold again today. Do you hate the
cold? I'm quite resistant to it.
<PAGE>
Perhaps it's because I was born in
winter, but I find it the most
comfortable time of the year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's snowing today. Oh look, the snow
looks like flower petals. Aren't they
pretty?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This wind and rain are awful... I hope
everything is okay at the farm. I'm
worried about the crops and the animals.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This wind and rain are awful... I hope
everything is okay at the farm. I'm
worried about the crops and the animals.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The weather is terrible, so
please take care when you go out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>To be honest, I don't want you venturing
out. But you're a farmer, so I won't
stop you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The weather is terrible, so
please take care when you go out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>To be honest, I don't want you venturing
out. But you're a farmer, so I won't
stop you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I understand you will be 
dating someone.
<PAGE>
Heehee, you look so happy. I hope that
you will cherish your time with this
special someone.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air around here is so refreshing.
<PAGE>
I think it's wonderful to find nature
like this so close to town.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The trees are so majestic here. When I
gaze up at those towering forms, I feel
energy filling up inside me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The murmuring sound of the river is so
soothing. This is a great place to
rejuvenate.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We had sparkling, clear rivers like this
in my hometown. It brings back
memories...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Blacksmiths use a lot of physical
strength, so I've always trained
regularly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>So walking up a mountain trail won't
tire me out at all.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When you climb this far, the view is so
spectacular. I feel my spirit being
cleansed by this beautiful sight.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Many of the tools used on a farm are
made by blacksmiths, so it's very
educational to be on farm.
<PAGE>
I wish I could make useful farm tools.
I'm still in training, so I'll devote
myself to this.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's so much land here, so I'm sure 
you can build the farm of yours
dreams. I envy that.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a quiet, restful place. Makes you
want to come here, even if it's not
for work.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It would be nice to find good ore
today. That would make training even
more exciting.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the day come when this town is
much more prosperous?
<PAGE>
I'll look forward to that day. In the
meantime, I'll do my best to make it
happen.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are more people than before and
the town has livened up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It would be great if the town continues
to grow at this rate. Let's both do our
best.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town has prospered so much lately
that I can't believe how quiet it was
back then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I've met all kinds of people and every
day has brought new discoveries. Life
is not boring at all.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is the true spirit of this town. It
has become a lively and fun place.
<PAGE>
We must all work together so that this
town continues to stay this way.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you interested in
smithing?
<PAGE>
There's so much to it and it's fun, so
if you're ever interested, please stop
by the workshop.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love to play musical instruments.
<PAGE>
It's a nice change from training, and I
often play the koto or shamisen.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm still in training, so I still make
lots of mistakes. I can't create
anything I'm satisfied with.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I'm going to open my own workshop
someday. When I do, please be my
customer.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come from a family of blacksmiths.
<PAGE>
My grandfather, my parents, my three
brothers...they're all blacksmiths.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Train every day. That is my motto and I
believe that perseverance will always
pay off.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My family is strict about manners and
etiquette.
<PAGE>
We practiced martial arts and the
performing arts daily. It was so hard.
I was often scolded as a child.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But the perseverance and understanding I
gained serve me well now. Today, I'm
grateful I went through it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When I chose this town for my training,
I was worried whether I'd make it or
not. But now, I'm glad I did.
<PAGE>
You are my precious support, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
If you stay by me hereafter, you will
be my tower of strength.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... I have gone beyond anger
to sheer exasperation.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Why,
you ask? Unless you figure it out
yourself, it is meaningless.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Just what am I to you anyway? I'm
getting more and more confused.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You think that our love isn't mutual,
<MYNAME>? I think you're still
dreaming.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It seems the people of this town are
watching over us.
<PAGE>
It's a bit embarrassing, but it means
they've acknowledged our relationship.
I'm very happy.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we began dating, <MYNAME>, I've been
able to curb my obstinacy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>They say that lovers start to pick up
each other's behaviors. I'm sure it's
happening to me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're near my age, but you have
a spectaular lively farm. I think it's
admirable.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm going to devote myself too, so I
hope we can do our best and support
each other.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Since I met you, <MYNAME>, I've
learned how precious it is to have
someone who supports you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I'm so happy I fell in love with you,
<MYNAME>, and that you are my one and
only.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What are you saying I should do?
Please, just leave me alone.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Lately, I just don't know what's on
your mind, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Was I the only one believing that we
were in love? I just don't understand
anymore.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Lately, I've been feeling anxious for
no good reason. I feel as though you
are going far away, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I lived alone, I would get up
around dawn, but lately, I've been
waking up later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You look so comfortable when you're
asleep, <MYNAME>, that I don't feel
like getting up.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We may have married, but I haven't
given up my dream to have a workshop. I
will continue to train.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When I'm with you, <MYNAME>, I always
feel like breaking out into a smile.
Every day is so peaceful.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm a lucky woman to have found such a
wonderful husband who has shown me the
joy of love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Thank you, <MYNAME>, for making me your
wife and letting me stay by you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry, but I'm still not used to
being someone's lover.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I hope that being with you will feel
natural in no time at all.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Things might be strained for a while,
but please don't worry about it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, let's never break up again.
<PAGE>
I never want to go through that anguish
again.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We'll be man and wife shortly. At this
moment, I am the happiest person in
this town. No doubt about it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The wedding ceremony was nice, wasn't
it? Hee hee, I won't forget it.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you looked so dashing in
your tuxedo and the thought that I was
marrying you made my heart flutter.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm still trying process all this, but
I have a baby growing inside me. I'll
remember to take care of myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>By the way, how much blacksmith training
is all right? Can I still temper iron?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My baby is doing fine, and when <MYNAME>
talks they start kicking up a storm. 
<PAGE>
They already love <MYNAME>, I can't wait
for them to meet in person.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wonder who this child I give birth to
will resemble. I can't wait for that
day.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As the mother of <CHILD_NAME>, I must
shape up. I will devote myself to being
a good, wise mother.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm watching <CHILD_NAME>, I get so
anxious, I want to reach out to grab
her.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But I don't want to become
overprotective, so... I'm realizing how
it is to raise a child.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> is picking up words so
quickly and growing day by day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I wonder what kind of adult she'll
become? I'm looking forward to it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> is becoming more resilient
and grown up. It makes me happy as her
mother.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fried lotus root!
<PAGE>
I'm happy to receive just any gift, but
this is my favorite food, so I'm doubly
happy. I can't wait to eat it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful present. I really love
this. Thank you very much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is...<ITEMNAME0>. You
remembered what I like.
Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is for me? I'm very happy. Thank
you very much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, this is for me? Thank you for taking
the time.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, I'm sorry. I hate to say it, but
this really isn't my taste. I'm still
grateful for the thought, though.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
My goodness...that terrible smell. Ever
since I was little, this is the one
smell I cannot stand.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But it's
the thought that counts, so I'll accept.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>! Look how big you grew it.
Oh? This is for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I feel bad accepting such a fine gift,
but I'm so happy. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>! I'm amazed at the size! Oh? 
This is for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I feel bad accepting such a wonderful
gift, but I'm so happy. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I didn't do anything to warrant such a
gift. I'm sorry, but can you put it
away?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't accept it. I'm sorry, but now
isn't the time.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I can't accept it. I'm sorry, but now
isn't the time.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel bad receiving so many gifts in
one day. The one you gave me earlier
is more than enough.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel bad receiving so many gifts in
one day. The one you gave me earlier
is more than enough.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel bad receiving so many gifts in
one day. I am already thrilled with the
present you gave me earlier.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's the matter? A birthday present?
That's...fried lotus root!
<PAGE>
You got it just for me? This is a truly
happy birthday. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What's the matter? A birthday present?
That's...<ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
I love it. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Huh? A birthday present?
And it's <ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
You remembered what I like. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? I'm so
happy. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This is my birthday present? Well...
Umm... This is quite unique. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This... is my birthday present? 
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I'm sorry. Err...It's something I don't
really care for. I'll keep it though.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
S-Squid rice for my birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I don't think I care to know why you
chose this, but I'll accept the
thought behind it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? A birthday present?! It's so
large! I'm touched. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? A birthday present?! It's so
grand. I'm touched. Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
F-Forgive me, but I'm not very good with
animals!
<PAGE>
N-Never mind! Please hurry and take it
away!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...for me? Such a pretty flower.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, that's right. Today is
the Flower Festival. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I know that it is the Flower Festival,
but it makes me very special to receive
flowers from my beloved.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I will put it in
my room and cherish it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a beautiful flower. Did you grow
this on your farm too, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I feel like a
princess right now.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this a Harmony Day present? You got
it just for me?
<PAGE>
You've made me so happy, <MYNAME>. Thank
you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Harmony Day candy? Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I feel like...you're about to tell me
something, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Harmony Day candy? I feel like
we're back in the days of our courtship.
I'm so happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A gift from the Pumpkin Festival? I
